name: Bug Blaster
description: This is my final version of the previous game "Insect Planet" I have implemented a couple modifications, the first being 3 unique levels, the second being a change in the HUD and different soundtracks for each level, a change in the Boss of the game and a change in the beams of the enemies. There a number of minuscule changes that should make the gameplay a little smoother as well. Hope you all enjoy!
